activities: Creative Automation is a data processing service provider that provides services to companies, our customers, to manage their customer information on their behalf.  Creative Automation does not own or control any of the information it processes on behalf of Creative Automation’s customer.  All such information is owned and/or controlled by Creative Automation’s customer.  These companies direct Creative Automation via written instructions on how to process their data to meet their objective.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom, Cyprus, Malta, Slovakia, Estonia, Latvia, Slovenia, Lithuania, Hungary, Poland, Czech Republic
